verses.t: LordThe {H3068} is my light{H216} and my salvation{H3468}; whom shall I fear{H3372}? Lordthe {H3068} is the strength{H4581} of my life{H2416}; of whom shall I be afraid{H6342}?
When the wicked{H7489}, even mine enemies{H6862} and my foes{H341}, came{H7126} upon me to eat up{H398} my flesh{H1320}, they stumbled{H3782} and fell{H5307}.came…: Heb. approached against me
Though an host{H4264} should encamp{H2583} against me, my heart{H3820} shall not fear{H3372}: though war{H4421} should rise{H6965} against me, in this will I be confident{H982}.

One{H259} thing have I desired{H7592} Lordof the {H3068}, that will I seek{H1245} after; that I may dwell{H3427} in the house{H1004} Lordof the {H3068} all the days{H3117} of my life{H2416}, to behold{H2372} the beauty{H5278} Lordof the {H3068}, and to enquire{H1239} in his temple{H1964}.the beauty: or, the delight

For in the time{H3117} of trouble{H7451} he shall hide{H6845} me in his pavilion{H5520}: in the secret{H5643} of his tabernacle{H168} shall he hide{H5641} me; he shall set me up{H7311} upon a rock{H6697}.

And now shall mine head{H7218} be lifted up{H7311} above mine enemies{H341} round about{H5439} me: therefore will I offer{H2076} in his tabernacle{H168} sacrifices{H2077} of joy{H8643}; I will sing{H7891}, yea, I will sing praises{H2167} Lordunto the {H3068}.joy: Heb. shouting
Hear{H8085}, LordO {H3068}, when I cry{H7121} with my voice{H6963}: have mercy{H2603} also upon me, and answer{H6030} me.
When thou saidst, Seek{H1245} ye my face{H6440}; my heart{H3820} said{H559} unto thee, Thy face{H6440}, Lord, will I seek{H1245}.When…: or, My heart said unto thee, Let my face seek thy face, etc

Hide{H5641} not thy face{H6440} far from me; put{H5186} not thy servant{H5650} away{H5186} in anger{H639}: thou hast been my help{H5833}; leave{H5203} me not, neither forsake{H5800} me, O God{H430} of my salvation{H3468}.
When my father{H1} and my mother{H517} forsake{H5800} Lordme, then the {H3068} will take me up{H622}.take…: Heb. gather me
Teach{H3384} me thy way{H1870}, LordO {H3068}, and lead{H5148} me in a plain{H4334} path{H734}, because of mine enemies{H8324}.a plain…: Heb. a way of plainnessmine…: Heb. those which observe me
Deliver{H5414} me not over unto the will{H5315} of mine enemies{H6862}: for false{H8267} witnesses{H5707} are risen up{H6965} against me, and such as breathe out{H3307} cruelty{H2555}.
I had fainted, unless{H3884} I had believed{H539} to see{H7200} the goodness{H2898} Lordof the {H3068} in the land{H776} of the living{H2416}.
Wait{H6960} Lordon the {H3068}: be of good courage{H2388}, and he shall strengthen{H553} thine heart{H3820}: wait{H6960}, LordI say, on the {H3068}.
